raw: Spain before and after Covid-19 state of emergency – in pictures .

raw: On 14 March the Spanish government formally declared a state of emergency to combat coronavirus , placing the country in lockdown and ordering people to stay at home for the two weeks unless they had to buy food or medicine or go to work or hospital .
